channel.title: Project 16 v6: need help on how to pk anywere if ur a gold mod
channel.description: can some1 help me out i wanna pk any1 anywere or fight with my mod freinds everywere but i nt sure how to do can some1 help?

item.title: Project 16 v6: need help on how to pk anywere if ur a gold mod
item.dc:creator: @propabad propabad
item.description:
@propabad wrote:

–V.6 Features–
-Converted from whitescape to cheezscape Update 80
-Added full pickpocketing
-Fixed thieving and woodcutting
-Fixed Magic Projectiles, Lvl reqs, and damages
-Cleaned up a lot of cheezscape
-Disabled most logs to reduce lag ALOT
-Wildy Level
-Dueling + Staking
-Teleblock
-Teleother
-Recoded Autosave, Saves File + Moreinfo File
-Imported All commands from P16
-ADDED HERBLORE + WORKING POTS!
-Fixed all Dragon hide glitches
-Added new npcs and deleted useless ones
-Login bug fixed the right way
-No more player limit on logins
-Fixed Shops
-Arrows for ranged
-Full Ancients
-Multi Barrages now ignore NPCs with 0 Health (thanks fassy)
-Added some Ardy Thieving stalls with lvls and emotes
-Full Barrows!
-Added Summoning the right way
-Dragon BattleAxe Special attack
-Added WorldObject autospawn (thanks Ramen)
-Put in Bolloons are Party Pete’s
-Fixed Dragon Battle Special, energy comes back over time

Castle Wars*
–Working now
–Sets hooded cloak for each new player
–Some doors and ladders fixed
–Glows (Red glow for Zammy,Blue for Sara)
–Complete pking system inside CW
–Magic on players in CW
–Get a Christmas Cracker everytime you score a point
–Same CW as all of you were playing when my server was online

Read full topic
item.source: Project 16 v6: need help on how to pk anywere if ur a gold mod
